mapper.sql: company_id, company_name, company_type, company_size, company_status, opr, opr_time, other, others,code
mapper.select: select a.*, b.key_name as companyStatusName, c.key_name as companyTypeName, d.key_name as companySizeName from company_info a left join dics_info b on a.company_status=b.key_value and b.dics_code='STATE' left join dics_info c on a.company_type=c.key_value and c.dics_code='CTYPE' left join dics_info d on a.company_size=d.key_value and d.dics_code='CSIZE' where a.company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into company_info
company_id,
company_name,
company_type,
company_size,
company_status,
opr,
opr_time,
other,
others,
code,
#{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{companyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companySize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{companyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update company_info
company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
company_type = #{companyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_size = #{companySize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
company_status = #{companyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
opr = #{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER},
opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
others = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update company_info set company_name = #{companyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company_type = #{companyType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_size = #{companySize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_status = #{companyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opr = #{opr,jdbcType=INTEGER}, opr_time = #{oprTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, other = #{other,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, others = #{others,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
